add_library(stm32u5xx_hal_driver "")
# Suppress the unused parameter warning for this target
target_compile_options(stm32u5xx_hal_driver PRIVATE -Wno-unused-parameter)

set(U5_DRIVER_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/src)

set(PREFIX_SRC ${U5_DRIVER_PATH}/Src)
set(PREFIX_INC ${U5_DRIVER_PATH}/Inc)

add_subdirectory(stm32u5xx_hal_config)

target_sources(stm32u5xx_hal_driver
    PRIVATE
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_adc.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_adc_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_comp.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_cordic.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_cortex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_crc.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_crc_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_cryp.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_cryp_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_dac.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_dac_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_dcache.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_dma.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_dma_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_exti.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_fdcan.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_flash.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_flash_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_fmac.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_gpio.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_i2c.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_i2c_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_icache.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_irda.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_iwdg.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_lptim.c
        #${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_msp_template.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_nand.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_nor.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_opamp.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_opamp_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_ospi.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_pcd.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_pcd_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_pwr.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_pwr_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_ramcfg.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_rcc.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_rcc_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_rng.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_rtc.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_rtc_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_sai.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_sai_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_smartcard.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_smartcard_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_smbus.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_spi.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_spi_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_sram.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_tim.c
        #${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_timebase_tim_template.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_tim_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_uart.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_uart_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_usart.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_usart_ex.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_hal_wwdg.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_adc.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_comp.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_cordic.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_crc.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_crs.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_dac.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_dma.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_exti.c
        #${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_fmac.c
        #${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_fmc.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_gpio.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_i2c.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_lptim.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_lpuart.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_opamp.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_pwr.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_rcc.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_rng.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_rtc.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_spi.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_tim.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_ucpd.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_usart.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_usb.c
        ${PREFIX_SRC}/stm32u5xx_ll_utils.c
    PUBLIC
        #${PREFIX_INC}/stm32_assert_template.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_adc_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_adc.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_comp.h
        #${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_conf_template.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_cordic.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_cortex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_crc_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_crc.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_cryp_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_cryp.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_dac_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_dac.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_dcache.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_def.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_dma_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_dma.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_exti.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_fdcan.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_flash_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_flash.h
        #${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_fmac.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_gpio_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_gpio.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_i2c_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_i2c.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_icache.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_irda_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_irda.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_iwdg.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_lptim.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_nand.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_nor.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_opamp_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_opamp.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_ospi.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_pcd_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_pcd.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_pwr_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_pwr.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_ramcfg.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_rcc_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_rcc.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_rng.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_rtc_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_rtc.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_sai_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_sai.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_smartcard_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_smartcard.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_smbus.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_spi_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_spi.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_sram.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_tim_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_tim.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_uart_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_uart.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_usart_ex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_usart.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_hal_wwdg.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_adc.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_bus.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_comp.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_cordic.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_cortex.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_crc.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_crs.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_dac.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_dma.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_exti.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_fmac.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_fmc.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_gpio.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_i2c.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_iwdg.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_lptim.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_lpuart.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_opamp.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_pwr.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_rcc.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_rng.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_rtc.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_spi.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_system.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_tim.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_ucpd.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_usart.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_usb.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_utils.h
        ${PREFIX_INC}/stm32u5xx_ll_wwdg.h
)

target_link_libraries(stm32u5xx_hal_driver PUBLIC cmsis_device_u5)
target_include_directories(stm32u5xx_hal_driver PUBLIC src/Inc)
target_compile_definitions(stm32u5xx_hal_driver PUBLIC USE_FULL_LL_DRIVER)
